measured_by: salience-manipulated trials ( Flooring color and text contrast )
justification: The experiment manipulated salience by changing the background color of one option and its font to white, contrasting with the non-salient options, to assess its impact on decision-making.

topic_or_construct: individual differences in decision-making under salience
justification: The CTSQ was administered to participants to characterize individual differences in thinking styles and their relation to salience model parameters.
The CRT was used to measure participants' tendency towards more intuitive, system 1 thinking styles, which correlated with the initial salience boost parameter.
